  config.vm.box = "hashicorp/bionic64"

```
#!/usr/bin/env bash

apt-get -y update
apt-get install -y nginx
service nginx start
```

```
Vagrant.configure("2") do |config|
  config.vm.box = "hashicorp/bionic64"

  config.vm.provision :shell, path: "provision.sh"

  config.vm.network "forwarded_port", guest: 80, host: 8080
end
```
